allow: Bash(python3 -c " import json, re with open\(''/private/tmp/claude-501/-Users-vatsal-Downloads-Codebase-voice-test-harness/tasks/aafd59d.output''\) as f: content = f.read\(\) # Find the main research report text block texts = re.findall\(r''""text"":""\(\(?:[^""\\\\]|\\\\.\)*\)""'', content\) long_texts = [t for t in texts if len\(t\) > 500] # Print the longest ones \(likely the report sections\) for i, t in enumerate\(long_texts\): if any\(kw in t.lower\(\) for kw in [''vllm'', ''orpheus.*server'', ''streaming api'', ''community.*server'', ''quantiz'', ''modal'', ''serverless'', ''sentence.*split'', ''hinglish'']\): print\(f''--- TEXT BLOCK {i} \(len={len\(t\)}\) ---''\) # Unescape unescaped = t.encode\(\).decode\(''unicode_escape'', errors=''replace''\)[:2000] print\(unescaped\) print\(\) ")
